synopsis.text:
Hour by hour, the once detached Makoto Yuuki finds himself immersed in the world of Persona users, forming unbreakable bonds with his fellow teammates in the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES). As the cherry blossoms of spring give way to the warmth of summer, Makoto and SEES continue their relentless battle against the ominous Shadows. However, a new threat looms on the horizon: Strega, a rogue group of Persona users with a hidden agenda connected to the Dark Hour.

Amidst the brewing storm, an enigmatic android, Aegis, joins their ranks, displaying unparalleled power and a mysterious connection to Makoto. As they journey together, the intricate threads of their shared destiny begin to unravel, revealing the true nature of the Dark Hour and the bond that ties Aegis and Makoto together.

With each passing day, Makoto cherishes the camaraderie he has found, wishing for the happiness to last forever. But as the season turns, so do the tides of fate. The SEES team, now stronger than ever, braces for the challenges that lie ahead, determined to face them together in their quest to uncover the truth behind the Dark Hour.
